Ethereum Foundation Director Tomasz on Why He Joined Ethereum Development

On December 29, 2025, Tomasz Stanczak, Co-Executive Director of the Ethereum Foundation, said in an interview with ETHPanda that his early involvement in Ethereum development stemmed from personal technical curiosity. He initially aimed to build on-chain tools for his own use, then deepened his work at the protocol layer by studying the Ethereum Yellow Paper and implementing the EVM. As his personal project evolved into a functional client, he chose to bootstrap and found Nethermind. He noted that Ethereum‚Äôs open, permissionless nature enables developers to enter core development through self-exploration even without a clearly defined path‚Äîan important reason the ecosystem continues to attract builders.
